attributes.description:
Drive away with confidence and peace of mind when you purchase one of our MasterCars or Used Cars. Guaranteed value, pre-owned vehicles with the perfect price to suit your budget. We offer in-house finance and are Rated No1 in service. We deliver nationwide. Click and come and meet our energetic and passionate sales team at Hatfield VW Northcliff. 
Standard 3 year/120 000km warranty on select MasterCars. 80-point Mechanical check on ALL MasterCars.
Prices excludes all fees/costs. No obligation pre-approval to apply click on: https://www.hatfieldgroup.co.za/hatfield-vw-northcliff-finance-application.aspx
Remember we want your trade-in… for an evaluation, send an email to: UsedNorthcliff@hatfield.holdings – Please use Subject: (Trade-in!) Value-added options available.
Feel free to get in touch with us if you need any further information, our WhatsApp number is: 0716341053
